Text.Name: NpcFight_BaseHitChance
Text.Desc: The chance of Outer Disciples directly hitting the enemy.

Text.Name: NpcFight_BaseDodgeChance
Text.Desc: The chance of Physical cultivators directly dodging an attack.

Text.Name: NpcFight_FabaoNum
Text.Desc: Number of artifacts the character can carry.

Text.Name: NpcFight_FabaoLingRecoverK
Text.Desc: The ratio of Qi recovered by an artifact to Qi absorbed from the character.

Text.Name: NpcFight_FabaoPowerAddP
Text.Desc: Damage ability of artifacts.

Text.Name: NpcFight_FabaoLingRecoverAddP
Text.Desc: Recovery rate of Artifact Qi.

Text.Name: NpcFight_FabaoCoolDownAddP
Text.Desc: The minimum interval between Artifact-launched attacks.

Text.Name: NpcFight_FabaoMaxLingAddP
Text.Desc: Maximum amount of Qi an artifact may contain.

Text.Name: NpcFight_FabaoRepelDistanceAddV
Text.Desc: Knockback distance when two artifacts clash.

Text.Name: NpcFight_FabaoFlySpeedAddP
Text.Desc: Speed at which artifacts fly.

Text.Name: NpcFight_FabaoTurnSpeedAddP
Text.Desc: Speed at which artifacts turn.

Text.Name: NpcFight_FabaoRepelResistanceAddV
Text.Desc: Knockback resistance when two artifacts clash.

Text.Name: NpcFight_FabaoTrailingLengthAddP
Text.Desc: Trail length when artifacts fly.

Text.Name: NpcFight_SpellPowerAddP
Text.Desc: Effect size of spells when casting damage or healing spells.

Text.Name: NpcFight_SpellLingCostAddP
Text.Desc: Qi cost of casting spells.

Text.Name: NpcFight_SpellCastTimeAddP
Text.Desc: The length of preparation time needed before releasing Spells.

Text.Name: NpcFight_FightSkillSoul
Text.Desc: Only those who have reached the highest level in the ways of Spells are able to produce it. Attach it to a Spell, and the Spell would be automatically released during battle.

Text.Name: NpcFight_ShieldConversionRate
Text.Desc: The bonus value added to the amount of damage reduction granted by each point of Qi when withstanding damage with Qi Barrier.

Text.Name: NpcFight_ShieldConversionRateAddP
Text.Desc: The bonus applied to the amount of damage reduction granted by each point of Qi when withstanding damage with Qi Barrier.

Text.Name: NpcFight_ZhenKeyPointNum
Text.Desc: The size of the formation with this character as the pillar. A formation with more people will have a larger size.

Text.Name: NpcFight_ZhenEnginePower
Text.Desc: The load the formation can carry with this character as the pillar. A more complicated formation is capable of sustaining a heavier load.

Text.Name: NpcFight_ShieldResistanceToJin
Text.Desc: The damage reduction when the cultivator was sustaining Metal damage.

Text.Name: NpcFight_ShieldResistanceToMu
Text.Desc: The damage reduction when the cultivator was sustaining Wood Damage.

Text.Name: NpcFight_ShieldResistanceToShui
Text.Desc: The damage reduction when the cultivator was sustaining Water Damage.

Text.Name: NpcFight_ShieldResistanceToHuo
Text.Desc: The damage reduction when the cultivator was sustaining Fire Damage.

Text.Name: NpcFight_ShieldResistanceToTu
Text.Desc: The damage reduction when the cultivator was sustaining Earth Damage.
